scripts.build:all: npm run build:backend && npm run build:frontend
scripts.lint:all: npm run lint --workspace=packages/frontend && npm run lint --workspace=packages/backend
scripts.type-check: npm run type-check --workspace=packages/frontend && npm run type-check --workspace=packages/backend
scripts.vercel-build: npm run sync-api && npm run build --workspace=packages/frontend
scripts.ci: npm run lint:all && npm run type-check && npm test && npm run build:all
